name: Thimble Knight
description:
Thimble Knight is a 2D side-scrolling platformer where the player is the titular Thimble Knight exploring a quiet, derelict house filled with organic platforming or household enemies for a miniature perspective.

Controls
  • Use A and D to move left and right
  • Press SPACE to jump
  • Left click to attack
  • Right click to use the grappling hook
  • Scroll Up to decrease grappling hook length and Scroll Down to increase grappling hook length
